Comments_List: This course helped me improve on my understanding of 'sound' as a general concept. I learned a lot about the relationship between music and computer science.

Scott is an excellent, engaging, and knowledgeable lecturer. The course is taught quite well, Scott structures his teaching around a couple different basic sound synthesis methods and then allows the final to be quite open ended.

If you're into music OR compsci, and you have any level of interest in BOTH of those things, you must take this course!! It's quite the journey. There is so much creative coding involved, and Scott is such an energetic and knowledgable lecturer.
